definitions.definition: A journey or effort in pursuit of a goal (often lengthy, ambitious , or fervent ); a mission .

subdefinitions.definition: ( video games ) A task that a player may complete in order to gain a reward or advance the story.

definitions.definition: The act of seeking, or looking after anything; attempt to find or obtain; search; pursuit.
examples: to rove in quest of game, of a lost child, of property, etc.

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) A request; a desire; a solicitation.
( obsolete ) A group of people conducting a search or inquiry .
( obsolete ) An inquest ; a jury of inquest.

main_definition: A journey or effort in pursuit of a goal (often lengthy, ambitious , or fervent ); a mission .
